title: Frankenstein; or The Modern Prometheus
description: binding: morocco leather, half red, gold-stamped lettering/designs; fabric sides; endpapers: white wove; slip case: paper over cardboard, stamped with red lettering and designs; type: Goethe; gilt-edged top; deckle-edged, side; 280 pp.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
